description:
Garfield Kart - Furious Racing is a chaotic kart racer featuring
everyone's favourite orange cat and plenty of lasagna.

Requires mod v0.4.X

# Changes
- Fixed various generation problems to comply with the fuzzer

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FeluciaPS/Archipelago/commits/v0.4.4-beta
0.4.4-beta.title: Garfield Kart - Furious Racing v0.4.4

v0.1-alpha.description:
Features:
- 2 goals: Grand Prix and Puzzle Piece Hunt
- Randomized cup unlocks 
  - Progressive and fully random
- Randomized puzzle pieces
  -  Automatically enabled for the Puzzle Piece Hunt goal

Notes:
- Generation succeeds with all yaml options EXCEPT the ones clearly marked as DOES NOT WORK
  - Playthroughs in the spoiler log look a little suspicious sometimes so keep an eye out for logic bugs

apworld by @FeluciaPS 
Mod by @robotzurg at [the mod repository](https://github.com/robotzurg/GarfieldKartAPMod)
Research assistance by vyik and Av in the archipelago discord server
v0.1-alpha.title: Garfield Kart - Furious Racing v0.1

v0.2-alpha.description:
# Features
- Now supports randomised races! 
  - Cups are unlocked when you unlock all races in the cup
- Added a yaml option for the randomised races
  - Cups unlock when all races in a cup are unlocked, unless you randomise both
  - When only races are randomised, beating cups doesn't grant checks unless the (unimplemented) randomise spoilers setting is on.
- Added a yaml option to set the amount of randomised puzzle pieces, the rest are replaced with filler items
- Lots of code improvements under the hood, we're getting really close to having all essentials implemented

# Fixes
- Fixed a problem where runs with randomized puzzle pieces could softlock if a cup was supposed to be unlocked by a puzzle piece in that cup
- Fixed unclear generation error when trying to generate a game that randomizes nothing

# Notes and bugs
- Generation fails if you turn off all randomization options, randomize at least puzzle pieces, races, or cups in order to successfully generate your game
  - In the future this will not be possible, always forcing something to be random
- This release is backwards compatible with any mod version before v0.2 as long as you don't use any new yaml options and set randomize_races to "cups".

apworld by @FeluciaPS 
Mod by @robotzurg at [the mod repository](https://github.com/robotzurg/GarfieldKartAPMod/releases)
Research assistance by vyik and Av in the archipelago discord server

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FeluciaPS/Archipelago/compare/v0.1-alpha...v0.2-alpha
v0.2-alpha.title: Garfield Kart - Furious Racing v0.2

v0.3.0-alpha.description:
# Features
- Added Item Randomization
- Added Hat/Spoiler Randomization
- Added Time Trial Goal
- Added the choice to select a specific CC or time trial medal needed for the goals/checks
- Fixed various generation issues

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FeluciaPS/Archipelago/compare/v0.2-alpha...v0.3.0-alpha
v0.3.0-alpha.title: Garfield Kart - Furious Racing v0.3.0

v0.3.2-alpha.description:
**Requires mod v0.3.5 or later**

Bug turned feature! I fixed a mod bug that prevented CPUs from using items, but kind of liked it so now it's an option
# Changes
- Add "Disable CPU Items" yaml option
 
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FeluciaPS/Archipelago/compare/v0.3.1-alpha...v0.3.2-alpha
v0.3.2-alpha.title: Garfield Kart - Furious Racing v0.3.2

v0.4.0-beta.description:
**Requires mod v0.4.X!** 

# About compabibility
Going forward, we're making sure minor mod version updates (eg 0.4.0 -> 0.4.1) are always backwards compatible, but major updates (eg 0.3.X -> 0.4.X) aren't. This means you can always safely update your mod to a new version as long as the first 2 digits are the same, and it should **never** break games that have already been generated. If a new minor mod version does break a generated world, please let us know immediately~

# Apworld changes
- Added character and kart randomizer
- Add quality of life options
  - Springs only (for all your puzzle hunting needs)
  - Disable CPU items (less chaos is more good, probably)
  - Lap count (because why drive for 3 laps when you can drive for 10)
- Fixed a generation bug when multiple garfield kart yamls exist for the same world

# Mod changes
I did heaps of code cleanup on the mod side between v0.3.0 and now, which has made the whole thing easier to debug. We then proceeded to fix a bunch of bugs:
- Fixed various bugs relating to race access, you should now be able to always access the races you should be able to access
- Use archipelago logo for puzzle pieces! A future mod version will use custom sprites that aren't quite ready for release yet!
- Puzzle pieces in-game correctly show as collected in the HUD now!
- Fixed a bug that caused CPUs to be unable to use items (and added it right back in as a feature!)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FeluciaPS/Archipelago/compare/v0.3.0-alpha...v0.4.0-beta
v0.4.0-beta.title: Garfield Kart - Furious Racing v0.4.0
